summary.para: CoolClock component. Uses the http://randomibis.com/coolclock widget as Wisej control.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.CoolClock.CoolClock
member.summary: CoolClock is a customizable javascript analog clock from http://randomibis.com/coolclock.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.CoolClock.CoolClock.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the control.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.CoolClock.CoolClock.TabStop
member.summary: This property is not relevant to this class.

member.summary: This property is not relevant to this class.

member.summary: This property is not relevant for this class.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.CoolClock.CoolClock.TickDelay
member.summary: Returns or sets the tick delay.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.CoolClock.CoolClock.LongTickDelay
member.summary: Returns or sets the long tick delay.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.CoolClock.CoolClock.ShowSecondHand
member.summary: Shows or hides the second hand.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.CoolClock.CoolClock.Skin
member.summary: Returns or sets the skin used to render the CoolClock.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.CoolClock.CoolClock.ClockType
member.summary: Returns or sets the type of clock to render.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.CoolClock.CoolClock.GmtOffset
member.summary: Returns or sets the GMT offset.
